import re

with open\(''C:/Projects/slayerlegend/wiki/functions/_shared/handlers/github-bot.js'', ''r''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# The file has been corrupted by sed commands
# Let''s identify patterns that need fixing
lines = content.split\(''\\n''\)
fixed_lines = []
i = 0
while i < len\(lines\):
    line = lines[i]
    # Check for broken adapter.createJsonResponse patterns
    if ''adapter.createJsonResponse\('' in line and i + 2 < len\(lines\):
        # This is a multi-line createJsonResponse call
        next_line = lines[i+1]
        if ''error:'' in next_line or ''verified:'' in next_line:
            # Check if it has proper closing
            if i + 2 < len\(lines\) and ''}\);'' not in lines[i+2] and ''};'' in lines[i+2]:
                # Need to add closing paren
                fixed_lines.append\(line\)
                fixed_lines.append\(next_line\)
                fixed_lines.append\(lines[i+2].replace\(''};'', ''}\);''\)\)
                i += 3
                continue
    fixed_lines.append\(line\)
    i += 1

with open\(''C:/Projects/slayerlegend/wiki/functions/_shared/handlers/github-bot.js'', ''w''\) as f:
    f.write\(''\\n''.join\(fixed_lines\)\)
    
print\(''Fixed syntax''\)
")
